## UserTroveStatus type

Represents whether a UserTrove is open or not, or why it was closed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UserTroveStatus = "nonExistent" | "open" | "closedByOwner" | "closedByLiquidation" | "closedByRedemption";
```
